abstract: Rackspace and NASA have teamed up to create an open cloud computing system that could rival services from Amazon.com, Google, Microsoft and others.
snippet: Rackspace and NASA have teamed up to create an open cloud computing system that could rival services from Amazon.com, Google, Microsoft and others.
lead_paragraph: Ah, the cloud. It sounds like such a wonderful, fluffy place where computers hum away all day long and information roams free.

headline.main: The Recipe for Clouds Goes Open-Source

abstract: The nonprofit Lifeboat Foundation has caught the attention of Google, Hewlett-Packard and others as it looks to finance programs to keep dangerous technology in check.
snippet: The nonprofit Lifeboat Foundation has caught the attention of Google, Hewlett-Packard and others as it looks to finance programs to keep dangerous technology in check.
lead_paragraph: Do antimatter fears keep you up at night? Has your day been ruined by worries about black holes? Are you paralyzed by the oncoming threat of ecophages and nonreplicating nanoweapons?

headline.main: The Lifeboat Foundation: Battling Asteroids, Nanobots and A.I.

lead_paragraph: 3:37 p.m. | Updated  to include information from the press conference by Claire Cain Miller.

byline.original: By Nick Bilton and Claire Cain Miller
